Title: Anchors Aweigh
Cast: Frank Sinatra, Kathryn Grayson, Gene Kelly, José Iturbi, Dean Stockwell, Pamela Britton, Rags Ragland, Billy Gilbert, Henry O'Neill, Carlos Ramírez, Edgar Kennedy, Grady Sutton, Leon Ames, Sharon McManus, James Flavin
Plot: Two sailors, one naive, the other experienced in the ways of the world, on liberty in Los Angeles, is the setting for this movie musical. Two sailors, one naive, the other experienced in the ways of the world, on liberty in Los Angeles, is the setting for this movie musical. Written by Stewart M. Clamen <clamen@cs.cmu.edu>
Keywords: sailor, piano playing, cartoon mouse, part animation, movie set
Location: Hollywood Bowl - 2301 N. Highland Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
Actors: Frank Sinatra, Kathryn Grayson, Gene Kelly
Writer: Isobel Lennart (screen play), Natalie Marcin (suggested by a story by)
Description: Directed by George Sidney.  With Frank Sinatra, Kathryn Grayson, Gene Kelly, José Iturbi. Two sailors, one naive, the other experienced in the ways of the world, on liberty in Los Angeles, is the setting for this movie musical.
